function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased energy consumption during typical office and school hours due to residential occupancy","Impact":"Higher risk of spread of contagious diseases due to increased occupancy in residential buildings","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce energy usage during peak occupancy hours, encourage remote work or staggered schedules","Technologies":"Smart energy management systems, occupancy sensors, remote work technology","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, employers, energy management companies"},{"Description":"Shift in energy usage pattern due to remote work and school","Impact":"Altered daily routines leading to potential changes in hygiene practices and exposure to risk of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Education on healthy hygiene practices, regular cleaning and disinfection of high-touch surfaces, provision of health and safety resources","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and sensing for hygiene compliance, automated cleaning and disinfection systems","People":"Residents, remote workers, students","Owner":"Employers, educational institutions, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Variations in energy use based on income groups and job occupations","Impact":"Potential correlation between income and risk of exposure to contagious diseases, based on occupation and job loss","Mitigation":"Support for job security, financial assistance, and access to health resources for vulnerable income groups","Technologies":"Digital platforms for job matching, financial assistance programs, telemedicine services","People":"Low-income households, essential workers, unemployed individuals","Owner":"Government, social support organizations, healthcare providers"}]}
